mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_CAGOFTRDINF (ACCTSPECTRSTDSPNSGMTSEQNO, CAGOFTRDINFSEQNO, CHANTRANTYPE, TRANDATE, TRANAMT, DUETRANMON, DETINFO) values (#{AcctSpecTrstDspnSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CagOfTrdInfSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ChanTranType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{TranDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{TranAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{DueTranMon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{DetInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select ACCTSPECTRSTDSPNSGMTSEQNO, CAGOFTRDINFSEQNO, CHANTRANTYPE, TRANDATE, TRANAMT, DUETRANMON, DETINFO,PARAGRAPHDEL from PBCRS_REPORT_CAGOFTRDINF where ACCTSPECTRSTDSPNSGMTSEQNO = #{AcctSpecTrstDspnSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CAGOFTRDINFSEQNO = #{CagOfTrdInfSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ACCTSPECTRSTDSPNSGMTSEQNO, CAGOFTRDINFSEQNO, CHANTRANTYPE, TRANDATE, TRANAMT, DUETRANMON, DETINFO from PBCRS_REPORT_CAGOFTRDINF

select ACCTSPECTRSTDSPNSGMTSEQNO, CAGOFTRDINFSEQNO, CHANTRANTYPE, TRANDATE, TRANAMT, DUETRANMON, DETINFO from PBCRS_REPORT_CAGOFTRDINF where ACCTSPECTRSTDSPNSGMTSEQNO = #{AcctSpecTrstDspnSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_CAGOFTRDINFM (ACCTSPECTRSTDSPNSGMTSEQNO, CAGOFTRDINFSEQNO, CHANTRANTYPE, TRANDATE, TRANAMT, DUETRANMON, DETINFO,REPORTFLAG, ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS) select ACCTSPECTRSTDSPNSGMTSEQNO, CAGOFTRDINFSEQNO, CHANTRANTYPE, TRANDATE, TRANAMT, DUETRANMON, DETINFO,'0', ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS from PBCRS_REPORT_CAGOFTRDINF where ACCTSPECTRSTDSPNSGMTSEQNO = #{AcctSpecTrstDspnSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CAGOFTRDINFSEQNO = #{CagOfTrdInfSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
